ref: 8967 prāśanīya n. ʻ food ʼ MBh., or poss. *prāśanikā -- . [Cf. prāśana -- n. ʻ feeding ʼ Gr̥Śr., ʻ first feeding of an infant ʼ Mn., prāśayati ʻ feeds ʼ ĀśvGr̥. -- √aś2]
Ku. pāsiṇi f. ʻ ceremony of giving a baby grain during 6th or 7th month for the first time ʼ;
N. pāsni ʻ the first giving of food to an infant ʼ;
H. pāsnī, pasanī f. ʻ ceremony of feeding an infant with rice ʼ.
